Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1983...
Injured on 5/14/1985 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Released by Minnesota on 8/15/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 8/15/1985 to a minor league deal...
Earned first career win on 5/14/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1990, winning 2 games with a 0.56 ERA...
Injured on 4/19/1991 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from Los Angeles to Philadelphia on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: LF M. Lawton, P J. Valera. Going to PHI: P B. Wilkinson)...
Injured on 5/3/1993 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
